value.questionText: To ask the Minister for the Cabinet Office, what recent steps he has taken to develop relations between the UK Government and the European Union.
value.answerText: At the first UK-EU Summit held on 19 May, the Government agreed a substantial package to take forward our future partnership. The Government will now move forward to begin negotiations to conclude as swiftly as possible. We will keep Parliament updated on...
value.heading: UK Relations with EU
